casebody.data:
Eric X. RAMBERT, Appellant
v.
DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS and Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellees No. 38 WAP 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 21, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 21 st day of February, 2018, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED .
